mapper.sql: ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, OPERATE_ID, MAJORCATE_ID, SUBCATE_ID, NAME
mapper.insert: insert into t_capabilitylabel_param (ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, OPERATE_ID, MAJORCATE_ID, SUBCATE_ID, NAME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_capabilitylabel_param
ID,
CREATE_DATE,
UPDATE_DATE,
OPERATE_ID,
MAJORCATE_ID,
SUBCATE_ID,
NAME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{majorcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{subcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_capabilitylabel_param
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATE_ID = #{operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAJORCATE_ID = #{majorcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUBCATE_ID = #{subcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_capabilitylabel_param set CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATE_ID = #{operateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAJORCATE_ID = #{majorcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBCATE_ID = #{subcateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_capabilitylabel_param where 1=1
AND MAJORCATE_ID = #{majorcateId ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND NAME like concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%')
ORDER BY MAJORCATE_ID,SUBCATE_ID

select
from t_capabilitylabel_param WHERE SUBCATE_ID IS NULL or SUBCATE_ID='' ORDER by MAJORCATE_ID
SELECT MAX(SUBCATE_ID) FROM t_capabilitylabel_param WHERE MAJORCATE_ID= #{value}
